properties.areaDesc: Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; Northern Elko County
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 31 at 2:49PM PST until January 2 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Elko NV
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches
in valley locations, 6 to 14 inches in most mountain areas, and
up to a foot and a half of new snow at the highest elevations.
Light freezing rain is also possible early Wednesday morning.

* WINDS...Northwest 10 to 25 mph with gusts of 25 to 55 mph which
will result in blowing and drifting of snow.

* WHERE...Northern Elko County and Ruby Mountains/East Humboldt
Range.

* WHEN...From 4 AM Wednesday to 4 AM PST Thursday.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Travel could be very difficult. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage. Brief heavy snow
showers could lead to significantly reduced visibilities.
properties.instruction:
A Winter Weather Advisory for snow means periods of snow will
cause primarily travel difficulties. Expect snow covered roads
and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM WEDNESDAY TO 4 AM PST THURSDAY
